services.subtitle: Daryeel qalliin oo dhammaystiran dhammaan baahiyahaaga

cardio.title: Qalliinka Wadnaha
cardio.description: Qalliinada horumarsan ee wadnaha, sambabaha iyo laabta

neuro.title: Qalliinka Maskaxda
neuro.description: Daryeel qalliin oo gaar ah oo maskaxda, lafta dhabarka iyo neerfaha

plastic.title: Qalliinka Qurxinta & Dib u Dhiska
plastic.description: Qalliinada qurxinta iyo dib u dhiska

pediatric.description: Daryeel qalliin oo gaar ah oo carruurta

urological.title: Qalliinka Kaadida
urological.description: Daaweynta qalliinka ee kaadida iyo taranka ragga

general.title: Qalliinka Guud
general.description: Noocyo kala duwan oo qalliinno guud ah

cta.title: Ma u Baahan Tahay La-talin?
cta.description: Kooxdayada qalliinka ee khibradda leh ayaa halkan kuu jooga. Ballan sameyso maanta.

faq.title: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Isweydiiyo
faq.noQuestions: Ma jiraan su'aalo adeegan ku saabsan

gallery.title: Sawirrada
gallery.viewLarger: Riix si aad u aragto sawir weyn
gallery.noImages: Ma jiraan sawirro adeegan ku saabsan

footer.aboutDescription: Waxaan nahay xarun qalliin oo takhasus leh oo bixisa adeegyo caafimaad oo dhammeystiran.
footer.working: Had iyo jeer halkan kuu nahay - Adeeg 24/7!

faq.title: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Isweydiiyo
faq.description: Ka hel jawaabaha su'aalaha guud ee ku saabsan adeegyadayada qalliinka.
faq.contactPrompt: Haddii aadan ka helin su'aashaada halkan, fadlan nala soo xiriir.

surgeryTypes.question: Noocee qalliin ayaad samaysaan?
surgeryTypes.answer: Waxaan bixinaa noocyo kala duwan oo qalliin ah oo ay ku jiraan wadnaha iyo laabta, maskaxda, wajiga, guud ahaan, carruurta, qurxinta, iyo qalliinka kaadida.

consultation.question: Sideen balan u qabsan karaa?
consultation.answer: Waxaad balan ka qabsan kartaa adoo si toos ah u soo waca xarunteena ama buuxiya foomka xiriirka ee websaydkayaga. Shaqaalaheena ayaa kula soo xiriiri doona 24 saac gudahood.

insurance.question: Ma aqbashaan caymiska?
insurance.answer: Haa, waxaan la shaqeynaa inta badan shirkadaha caymiska waaweyn. Fadlan la xiriir shaqaalaheena maamulka si aad u hesho macluumaad gaar ah oo ku saabsan caymiskaaga.

beforeSurgery.question: Maxaan filayaa qalliinka ka hor?
beforeSurgery.answer: Ka hor qalliinka, waxaad yeelan doontaa la-talin dhammeystiran oo dhakhtarkaaga qalliinka ah, waxaad heli doontaa tilmaamo faahfaahsan oo qalliinka ka horeeya, iyo baaritaanno caafimaad oo lagama maarmaan ah si loo hubiyo inaad diyaar u tahay qalliinka.

postCare.question: Daryeel noocee ah ayaad bixisaan qalliinka kadib?
postCare.answer: Waxaan bixinaa daryeel dhammeystiran oo qalliinka kadib ah oo ay ku jiraan booqashooyin joogto ah, adeegyo baxnaanin marka loo baahdo, iyo taageero degdeg ah 24/7 bukaanadeena.

doctors.title: Dhakhaatiir Takhasus Leh
doctors.description: Dhakhaatiir khibrad leh oo ku takhasusay qeybaha kala duwan

surgeries.title: Qalliino Guul Ah
surgeries.description: Qalliino si guul leh loo dhammeeyay

satisfaction.title: Raalli Ahaanshaha Bukaanka
satisfaction.description: Jawaab-celin wanaagsan oo ka timid bukaanadeena

experience.title: Bilood Khibrad ah
